data.title: 2014 Release Schedule
data.meta_description: Official theatrical release schedule for all upcoming films in the year 2015. We tediously check and update this list to make sure the dates are 100% accurate. We also list both wide and limited release dates to the best of our abilities. If you find any discrepancies or missing films, let us know. - Public
data.text:
Official theatrical release schedule for all upcoming films in the year 2015. We tediously check and update this list to make sure the dates are 100% accurate. We also list both wide and limited release dates to the best of our abilities. If you find any discrepancies or missing films, let us know.

- Public Calendar with Only Nationwide Releases: HTML | iCAL

2014 | 2015 | 2016

Jan • Feb • Mar • Apr • May • Jun • Jul • Aug • Sept • Oct • Nov • Dec

Bold = Nationwide Release (Non-Bold = Limited Release)

Release dates subject to change. Click each title for project info / to view a trailer (if available).
